title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: To celebrate Pepe Flyers being at BTC Amsterdam 2023, Mantis Cryptos commissioned a PEPE FLYERS brass coin.Each coin is a 1.25" CNC milled diamond knurled edge blank that has been engraved with the Pepe Flyers logo on front and "BTC Amsterdam 2023" on the back.There are 36 coins in total, including 3 APs. Additionally there are 2 error coins, 1 maker coin and 1 AP error.Each coin is loaded with a fresh Pepe asset: PEPEINTHEDAM (38 locked supply) and secure on the back on the coin with a "B" bitcoin hologram and private key underneath.https://xchain.io/asset/PEPEINTHEDAMAlso, each coin was assembled with a special "1PEPE" address and contains 0.0002 bitcoin so the asset can be transferred to your FreeWallet or XCP wallet.... or just kept it on the coin as a collectible.Much thanks goes to the artists involved with making this happen:@MoparMiningLLC: coins/keys@Vizique: Token art@Chris from Scarce: Coin art@Mantis Cryptos: idea/assemblySPECS: 1 & 3/16 inch, brass, 26g (just under 1 oz)PRICE: 0.003BTC shipped in US (outside US extra shipping fee applies)
